section.title: &kw-hos-tm; &kw-hos-version-50;: Point-in-time Lifecycle Manager Recovery

para.para: In this scenario, everything is still running (lifecycle manager, controller nodes, and compute nodes) but you want to restore the lifecycle manager to a previous state.

section.para: In this scenario, everything is still running (lifecycle manager, controller nodes, and compute nodes) but you want to restore the lifecycle manager to a previous state.

listitem.para: Log in to the lifecycle manager.
Get the id corresponding to the job HLM Default: Deployer restore from Swift.
This will take some time. While you wait you can follow the progress in the /var/log/freezer-agent/freezer-scheduler.log log file.

sidebar.title: Restore from an SSH backup
sidebar.para: Follow the same procedure as for Swift but select the job HLM Default: Deployer restore from SSH.
